title.narrative: Gavi Programmes et Impact pour Érythrée (l')

description.narrative: Aperçu de l'ensemble des soutiens de Gavi à Érythrée (l'). À ce niveau, l'évaluation conjointe, le plan pluriannuel du pays, le rapport d'étape annuel sont fournis comme pièces justificatives, tandis que les taux de couvertures de vaccinations nationales troisième dose de Penta et première dose du vaccin contre la rougeole sont utilisées comme résultats de vaccination de référence. Pour plus de détails sur chaque soutien, veuillez-vous référer aux activités ci-dessous.

Parent Activity of Gavi's Support to Eritrea At this level, Joint Appraisal, Country Multi Year Plan, Annual Progress Report are provided as supporting documents, whereas National Coverage Penta third dose and Measles-containing-vaccine first-dose Coverage are used as high-level Immunization Results. For details on each vaccine please refer to child activities.

Note technique: Toutes les activités des pays soutenus par Gavi ont un statut «mise en œuvre» et par conséquent, aucune date de fin réelle est déterminée. Les pays éligibles peuvent soumettre des propositions et demandes de soutien à Gavi à tout moment.
Technical note: all Gavi Country activities have a status of "Implementation" and no Actual End Date, as qualifying countries are able to submit proposals to Gavi at any stage.

Targeted country assistance (TCA) are resources provided to in-country partners under Gavi’s partners’ engagement framework (PEF). A country’s TCA plan is based on needs expressed by the country during the joint appraisal discussions. It includes sets of activities, milestones and budget for a given year.

Targeted country assistance (TCA) are resources provided to in-country partners under Gavi’s partners’ engagement framework (PEF). A country’s TCA plan is based on needs expressed by the country during the joint appraisal discussions. It includes sets of activities, milestones and budget for a given year.

The joint appraisal is an in-country, multi-stakeholder review of the implementation progress and performance of Gavi's vaccine and cash grant support to the country, and of its contribution to improved immunisation outcomes. The outcome of the appraisal is the completed "joint appraisal report" that captures Gavi grant performance as well as implementation challenges. The joint appraisal report informs discussions with national coordination mechanisms on areas where greater national investments and efforts, as well as technical support, are needed.

Web page listing full archive of all available documents related to Gavi activity in Eritrea. This incudes all Proposals, Decision Letters, Country Plans, Evaluations & Reviews. Relevant documents are also linked to country and vaccine activities.
Tender opportunities with Gavi. Please note - not all opportunities are administered or made available through Gavi
Latest news and announcements for Gavi programmes in Eritrea

condition.narrative: Conditions are available in the decision letters published in child activities

title.narrative: Measles containing vaccine (first dose) coverage at the national level (MCV1)

description.narrative: Percentage of surviving infants receiving the first recommended dose of measles containing vaccine at the national level. Targets are calculated using administrative projections of surviving infants.

title.narrative: Pentavalent 3 coverage at the national level (Penta 3)

description.narrative: Percentage of surviving infants receiving the last (i.e. third) recommended dose of pentavalent vaccine at the national level. Targets are calculated using administrative projections of surviving infants.
